00016 template <class T>
00017 FCDPhysicsParameter<T>::FCDPhysicsParameter(FCDocument* document, const fm::string& ref) : FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric(document, ref)
00018 {
00019     value = NULL;
00020 }
00021 
00022 template <class T>
00023 FCDPhysicsParameter<T>::~FCDPhysicsParameter()
00024 {
00025     SAFE_DELETE(value);
00026 }
00027 
00028 // Clone
00029 template <class T>
00030 FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric* FCDPhysicsParameter<T>::Clone(FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric* _clone) const
00031 {
00032     FCDPhysicsParameter<T>* clone = NULL;
00033     if (_clone == NULL) _clone = clone = new FCDPhysicsParameter<T>(const_cast<FCDocument*>(GetDocument()), reference);
00034     else /* Only one up-cast and no way to verify it.. */ clone = (FCDPhysicsParameter<T>*) _clone;
00035 
00036     if (clone != NULL)
00037     {
00038         clone->value = new T(*value);
00039     }
00040 
00041     return _clone;
00042 }
00043 
00044 template <class T>
00045 void FCDPhysicsParameter<T>::SetValue(T val)
00046 {
00047     SAFE_DELETE(value);
00048     value = new T();
00049     *value = val;
00050     SetDirtyFlag();
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 template <class T>
00055 void FCDPhysicsParameter<T>::SetValue(T* val)
00056 {
00057     SAFE_DELETE(value);
00058     value = val;
00059     SetDirtyFlag();
00060 }
00061 
00062 // Flattening: overwrite the target parameter with this parameter
00063 template <class T>
00064 void FCDPhysicsParameter<T>::Overwrite(FCDPhysicsParameterGeneric* target)
00065 {
00066     ((FCDPhysicsParameter<T>*) target)->SetValue(value);
00067 }
00068 
00069 // Write out this ColladaFX parameter to the XML node tree
00070 template <class T>
00071 xmlNode* FCDPhysicsParameter<T>::WriteToXML(xmlNode* parentNode) const
00072 {
00073     xmlNode* parameterNode = FUXmlWriter::AddChild(parentNode, reference.c_str());
00074     AddContent(parameterNode, FUStringConversion::ToString(*value));
00075     
00076     //the translate and rotate elements need to be in a <mass_frame> tag.
00077     if ((reference == DAE_TRANSLATE_ELEMENT) || (reference == DAE_ROTATE_ELEMENT))
00078     {
00079         xmlNode* massFrameNode = FUXmlWriter::AddChild(parentNode, DAE_MASS_FRAME_ELEMENT);
00080         FUXmlWriter::ReParentNode(parameterNode, massFrameNode);
00081     }
00082     return parameterNode;
00083 }
